name: Hungry Shooter
description:
Shoot as many enemies as you can while staying alive!

Move around with WASD to get more bullets.

Scroll Up and Down to adjust the amount of bullets your next shot will take, more bullets is more penetration!

Click to fire at the mouse

Moving will make your hunger meter go down

Find food to replenish your hunger meter

Overeating will heal you

Hunger points:

Chicken: 100 Sausage: 75 Candy: 5 

Presentation
